00019 /* When appropriate, alloca is cleaner than malloc/free.  The storage
00020  * is freed automatically on return from a function. When using gcc the
00021  * builtin version is much faster. */
00022 #ifdef __GNUC__
00023 # undef alloca
00024 # define alloca(x) __builtin_alloca((x))
00025 #else
00026 /* this is necessary (and sufficient) for Solaris 10: */
00027 # ifdef __sun
00028 #  include <alloca.h>
00029 # endif
00030 #endif

00036 #define AZERO(x, n) {int _I_, _SZ_ = (n); for(_I_ = 0; _I_ < _SZ_; _I_++) (x)[_I_] = 0;}

00216 static R_INLINE double*
00217 apply_perm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
00218 {
00219     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[i] = src[perm ? perm[i] : i];
00220     return dest;
00221 }

00232 static R_INLINE int Gp_grp(int ind, int nf, const int *Gp)
00233 {
00234     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) if (ind < Gp[i + 1]) return i;
00235     error(_("invalid row index %d (max is %d)"), ind, Gp[nf]);
00236     return -1;                  /* -Wall */
00237 }

00247 static R_INLINE double sqr_length(const double *x, int n)
00248 {
00249     double ans = 0;
00250     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) ans += x[i] * x[i];
00251     return ans;
00252 }

00263 static R_INLINE double y_log_y(double y, double mu)
00264 {
00265     return (y) ? (y * log(y/mu)) : 0;
00266 }

00283 static int chkDims(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int nr, int nc)
00284 {
00285     SEXP MP = GET_SLOT(x, sym);
00286     int *dm = isMatrix(MP) ? INTEGER(getAttrib(MP, R_DimSymbol)) : (int*) NULL;
00287     if (!dm || !isReal(MP) || dm[0] != nr || dm[1] != nc)
00288         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE,
00289                         _("Slot %s must be a numeric matrix of size %d by %d"),
00290                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), nr, nc);
00291     return 0;
00292 }

00306 static int chkLen(char *buf, int nb, SEXP x, SEXP sym, int len, int zerok)
00307 {
00308     int ll;
00309 
00310     if (!(ll = LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, sym))) == len && zerok && !ll)
00311         return snprintf(buf, BUF_SIZE, _("Slot %s must have length %d."),
00312                         CHAR(PRINTNAME(sym)), len);
00313     return 0;
00314 }

00329 static double
00330 lme4_devResid(const double* mu, const double* pWt, const double* y,
00331               int n, int vTyp)
00332 {
00333     double ans = 0.;
00334     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00335         double mui = mu[i], wi = pWt ? pWt[i] : 1, yi = y[i];
00336         double ri = yi - mui;
00337         switch(vTyp) {
00338         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00339             ans += wi * ri * ri;
00340             break;
00341         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00342             ans += 2 * wi *
00343                 (y_log_y(yi, mui) + y_log_y(1 - yi, 1 - mui));
00344             break;
00345         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00346             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui));
00347             break;
00348         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00349             ans += 2 * wi * (y_log_y(yi, mui) - (yi - mui)/mui);
00350             break;
00351         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00352             ans += wi * (ri * ri)/(yi * mui * mui);
00353             break;
00354         default:
00355             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00356         }
00357     }
00358     return ans;
00359 }
00360 
00373 static void
00374 lme4_muEta(double* mu, double* muEta, const double* eta, int n, int lTyp)
00375 {
00376     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) { /* apply the generalized linear part */
00377         double etai = eta[i], tmp;
00378         switch(lTyp) {
00379         case 1:         /* logit */
00380             tmp = (etai < MLTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00381             ((etai > LTHRESH) ? INVEPS : exp(etai));
00382             mu[i] = tmp/(1 + tmp);
00383             muEta[i] = mu[i] * (1 - mu[i]);
00384             break;
00385         case 2:         /* probit */
00386             if (!MPTHRESH) {
00387                 MPTHRESH = qnorm5(DOUBLE_EPS, 0, 1, 1, 0);
00388                 PTHRESH = -MPTHRESH;
00389             }
00390             mu[i] = (etai < MPTHRESH) ? DOUBLE_EPS :
00391                 ((etai > PTHRESH) ? 1 - DOUBLE_EPS :
00392                  pnorm5(etai, 0, 1, 1, 0));
00393             tmp = dnorm4(eta[i], 0, 1, 0);
00394             muEta[i] = (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00395             break;
00396         case 3:         /* cauchit */
00397             error(_("cauchit link not yet coded"));
00398             break;
00399         case 4:         /* cloglog */
00400             error(_("cloglog link not yet coded"));
00401             break;
00402         case 5:         /* identity */
00403             mu[i] = eta[i];
00404             muEta[i] = 1.;
00405             break;
00406         case 6:         /* log */
00407             tmp = exp(eta[i]);
00408             muEta[i] = mu[i] =
00409                 (tmp < DOUBLE_EPS) ? DOUBLE_EPS : tmp;
00410             break;
00411         case 7:         /* sqrt */
00412             mu[i] = etai * etai;
00413             muEta[i] = 2 * etai;
00414             break;
00415         default:
00416             error(_("General form of glmer_linkinv not yet written"));
00417         }
00418     }
00419 }
00420 
00431 static void
00432 lme4_varFunc(double* var, const double* mu, int n, int vTyp)
00433 {
00434     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00435         double mui = mu[i];
00436         switch(vTyp) {
00437         case 1:                 /* constant variance */
00438             var[i] = 1.;
00439             break;
00440         case 2:                 /* mu(1-mu) variance */
00441             if (mui <= 0 || mui >= 1)
00442                 error(_("mu[i] must be in the range (0,1): mu = %g, i = %d"),
00443                       mu, i);
00444             var[i] = mui * (1 - mui);
00445             break;
00446         case 3:                 /* mu variance */
00447             if (mui <= 0)
00448                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00449             var[i] = mui;
00450             break;
00451         case 4:                 /* mu^2 variance */
00452             if (mui <= 0)
00453                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00454             var[i] = mui * mui;
00455             break;
00456         case 5:                 /* mu^3 variance */
00457             if (mui <= 0)
00458                 error(_("mu[i] must be positive: mu = %g, i = %d"), mu, i);
00459             var[i] = mui * mui * mui;
00460             break;
00461         default:
00462             error(_("Unknown vTyp value %d"), vTyp);
00463         }
00464     }
00465 }
00466         
00477 static void
00478 P_sdmult(double *dest, const int *perm, const CHM_SP A,
00479          const double *X, int nc)
00480 {
00481     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p), m = A->nrow, n = A->ncol;
00482     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), *tmp = Alloca(m, double);
00483     R_CheckStack();
00484 
00485     for (int k = 0; k < nc; k++) {
00486         AZERO(tmp, m);
00487         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00488             for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00489                 tmp[ai[p]] += X[j + k * n] * ax[p];
00490         }
00491         apply_perm(dest + k * m, tmp, perm, m);
00492     }
00493 }

00503 static double *ST_getPars(SEXP x, double *pars)
00504 {
00505     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
00506     int nf = LENGTH(ST), pos = 0;
00507     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00508         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00509         double *st = REAL(STi);
00510         int nci = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol))[0];
00511         int ncp1 = nci + 1;
00512 
00513         for (int j = 0; j < nci; j++)
00514             pars[pos++] = st[j * ncp1];
00515         for (int j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
00516             for (int k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
00517                 pars[pos++] = st[k + j * nci];
00518     }
00519     return pars;
00520 }
00521 
00535 static int                      /* populate the st, nc and nlev arrays */
00536 ST_nc_nlev(const SEXP ST, const int *Gp, double **st, int *nc, int *nlev)
00537 {
00538     int ans = 0, nf = LENGTH(ST);
00539 
00540     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00541         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
00542         int nci = *INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
00543 
00544         if (nci > ans) ans = nci;
00545         if (st) st[i] = REAL(STi);
00546         nc[i] = nci;
00547         nlev[i] = (Gp[i + 1] - Gp[i])/nci;
00548     }
00549     return ans;
00550 }
00551 
00563 static R_INLINE int
00564 theta_S_ind(int i, int nf, int *Gp, int *nlev, int *spt)
00565 {
00566         int trm = Gp_grp(i, nf, Gp);
00567         return (spt[trm] + (i - Gp[trm]) / nlev[trm]);
00568 }
00569 
00581 static void Tt_Zt(CHM_SP A, int *Gp, int *nc, int *nlev, double **st, int nf)
00582 {
00583     int *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int *)(A->p);
00584     double *ax = (double*)(A->x), one[] = {1,0};
00585 
00586     for (int j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) /* multiply column j by T' */
00587         for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1];) {
00588             int i = Gp_grp(ai[p], nf, Gp);
00589             
00590             if (nc[i] <= 1) p++;
00591             else {
00592                 int nr = p;     /* number of rows in `B' in dtrmm call */
00593                 while ((ai[nr] - Gp[i]) < nlev[i]) nr++;
00594                 nr -= p;        /* nr == 1 except in models with carry-over */
00595                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "N", "U", &nr, nc + i,
00596                                 one, st[i], nc + i, ax + p, &nr);
00597                 p += (nr * nc[i]);
00598             }
00599         }
00600 }

00602 /* Level-1 utilties that call at least one of the stand-alone utilities */
00603 
00610 static double lmm_update_fixef_u(SEXP x)
00611 {
00612     double ans = NA_REAL;
00613     if (!V_SLOT(x) && !MUETA_SLOT(x)) { /* linear mixed model */
00614         int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), i1 = 1;
00615         int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00616         double *WX = (double*) NULL, *X = X_SLOT(x),
00617             *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
00618             *RZX = RZX_SLOT(x), *RX = RX_SLOT(x),
00619             *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
00620             *u = U_SLOT(x), *wy = (double*)NULL, *y = Y_SLOT(x),
00621             dn = (double) n, dnmp = (double) (n - p),
00622             mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00623         CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00624         CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00625         CHM_DN cu = N_AS_CHM_DN(u, q, 1), sol;
00626         R_CheckStack();
00627         
00628         if (sXwt) {             /* Replace X and y by weighted X and y */
00629             WX = Calloc(n * p, double);
00630             wy = Calloc(n, double);
00631             
00632             AZERO(WX, n * p);
00633             for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00634                 wy[i] = sXwt[i] * y[i];
00635                 for (int j = 0; j < p; j++)
00636                     WX[i + j * n] += sXwt[i] * X[i + j * n];
00637             }
00638             X = WX;
00639             y = wy;
00640         }
00641                                 /* solve L del1 = PAy */
00642         P_sdmult(u, (int*)L->Perm, A, y, 1);
00643         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cu, &c);
00644         Memcpy(u, (double*)sol->x, q);
00645         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00646                                 /* solve RX' del2 = X'y - RZX'del1 */
00647         F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &n, &p, one, X, &n,
00648                         y, &i1, zero, fixef, &i1);
00649         F77_CALL(dgemv)("T", &q, &p, mone, RZX, &q,
00650                         u, &i1, one, fixef, &i1);
00651         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "T", "N", &p, RX, &p, fixef, &i1);
00652         d[pwrss_POS] = sqr_length(y, n)
00653             - (sqr_length(fixef, p) + sqr_length(u, q));
00654         if (d[pwrss_POS] < 0)
00655             error(_("Calculated PWRSS for a LMM is negative"));
00656                                 /* solve RX beta-hat = del2 */
00657         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x), &p, fixef, &i1);
00658         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x), &q,
00659                         fixef, &i1, one, u, &i1);
00660         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, cu, &c)))
00661             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed:"));
00662         Memcpy(u, (double*)(sol->x), q);
00663         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
00664 
00665         d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length(u, q);
00666         d[wrss_POS] = d[disc_POS] = d[pwrss_POS] - d[usqr_POS];
00667         d[ML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] +
00668             dn * (1 + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2 * PI / dn));
00669         d[REML_POS] = d[ldL2_POS] + d[ldRX2_POS] +
00670             dnmp * (1. + log(d[pwrss_POS]) + log(2. * PI / dnmp));
00671         d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
00672                               (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : dn));
00673         d[sigmaREML_POS] = d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt(dn/dnmp);
00674 
00675         if (wy) Free(wy);
00676         if (WX) Free(WX);
00677         ans = d[dims[isREML_POS] ? REML_POS : ML_POS];
00678     }
00679     return ans;
00680 }
00681 
00687 static void update_A(SEXP x)
00688 {
00689     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x), Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
00690     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *ai = (int*)(A->i), *ap = (int*)(A->p),
00691         *zi = (int*)(Zt->i), *zp = (int*)(Zt->p), ncmax,
00692         nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS];
00693     int annz = ap[A->ncol], znnz = zp[Zt->ncol];
00694     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00695     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*), *ax = (double*)(A->x),
00696         *zx = (double*)(Zt->x);
00697     R_CheckStack();
00698 
00699     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00700 
00701     if (annz == znnz) { /* Copy Z' to A unless A has new nonzeros */
00702         Memcpy(ax, zx, znnz);
00703     } else { /* Only for nonlinear models with correlated random effects */
00704         AZERO(ax, annz);        /* Initialize potential nonzeros to 0 */
00705         for (int j = 0; j < A->ncol; j++) { /* Iterate over columns */
00706             int pa = ap[j];
00707             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++) { /* nonzeros in Z' */
00708                 while (ai[pa] < zi[p]) pa++;          /* matching pos in A */
00709                 if (ai[pa] != zi[p])
00710                     error(_("nonconforming Zt and A structures, j = %d"), j);
00711                 ax[pa] = zx[p];
00712             }
00713         }
00714     }
00715                                 /* When T != I multiply A on the left by T' */
00716     if (ncmax > 1) Tt_Zt(A, Gp, nc, nlev, st, nf);
00717                                 /* Multiply A on the left by S */
00718     for (int p = 0; p < annz; p++) {
00719         int i = Gp_grp(ai[p], nf, Gp);
00720         ax[p] *= st[i][((ai[p] - Gp[i]) / nlev[i]) * (nc[i] + 1)];
00721     }
00722 }
00723 
00734 static double update_L(SEXP x)
00735 {
00736     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00737     int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00738     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *cx = Cx_SLOT(x), *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
00739         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *mu = MU_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
00740         *pwt = PWT_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
00741         *var =  VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00742     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00743     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00744     R_CheckStack();
00745     
00746     if (var || pwt) {      /* Update srwt and res. Reevaluate wrss. */
00747         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
00748         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
00749             srwt[j] = sqrt((pwt ? pwt[j] : 1.0) / (var ? var[j] : 1.0));
00750             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
00751             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
00752         }
00753     }
00754     if (sXwt) {                 /* Update sXwt and C */
00755         int *ai = (int*)A->i, *ap = (int*)A->p;
00756         double *ax = (double*)(A->x);
00757         CHM_SP C = A;
00758 
00759         for (int j = 0; j < s; j++) {
00760             for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00761                 int ja = i + j * n;
00762                 sXwt[ja] = (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1) *
00763                     (muEta ? muEta[i] : 1) * (V ? V[ja] : 1);
00764             }
00765         }
00766         if (cx) {               /* C is a scaled version of A */
00767             for (int j = 0; j < n; j++)
00768                 for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++)
00769                     cx[p] = ax[p] * sXwt[j];
00770             A->x = (void*)cx;
00771         } else {
00772             int *ci, *cp;
00773             C = Cm_SLOT(x);
00774             R_CheckStack();
00775 
00776             ci = (int*)C->i; cp = (int*)C->p; cx = (double*)C->x;
00777             AZERO(cx, cp[n]);
00778             for (int j = 0; j < s; j++)
00779                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00780                     int ja = i + j * n, pc;
00781                     for (int pa = ap[ja]; pa < ap[ja + 1]; pa++) {
00782                         for (pc = cp[i]; pc < cp[i + 1]; pc++)
00783                             if (ci[pc] == ai[pa]) break;
00784                         if (pc >= cp[i + 1])
00785                             error(_("Structure of Cm and A are not consistent"));
00786                         cx[pc] += ax[pa] * sXwt[ja];
00787                     }
00788                 }
00789             A = C;
00790         }
00791     }
00792     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(A, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
00793         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
00794               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
00795 
00796     d[ldL2_POS] = M_chm_factor_ldetL2(L);
00797     d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS];
00798     d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
00799                           (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : (double) n));
00800     d[sigmaREML_POS] = (V || muEta) ? NA_REAL :
00801         d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt((((double) n)/((double)(n - p))));
00802     return d[pwrss_POS];
00803 }
00804 
00814 static double update_mu(SEXP x)
00815 {
00816     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
00817     int i1 = 1, n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00818     int ns = n * s;
00819     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *eta = ETA_SLOT(x),
00820         *etaold = (double*) NULL, *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
00821         *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x), *offset = OFFSET_SLOT(x),
00822         *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x), *res = RESID_SLOT(x),
00823         *var = VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00824     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00825     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00826     CHM_DN Ptu, ceta, cu = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_uSym));
00827     R_CheckStack();
00828 
00829     if (V) {
00830         etaold = eta;
00831         eta = Calloc(ns, double);
00832     }
00833                                 /* eta := offset or eta := 0 */
00834     for (int i = 0; i < ns; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
00835                                 /* eta := eta + X \beta */
00836     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &ns, &p, one, X_SLOT(x), &ns,
00837                     FIXEF_SLOT(x), &i1, one, eta, &i1);
00838                                 /* eta := eta + C' P' u */
00839     Ptu = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Pt, L, cu, &c);
00840     ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, ns, 1);
00841     R_CheckStack();
00842     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(A, 1 /* trans */, one, one, Ptu, ceta, &c))
00843         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
00844     M_cholmod_free_dense(&Ptu, &c);
00845 
00846     if (V) {            /* evaluate the nonlinear model */
00847         SEXP pnames = VECTOR_ELT(GET_DIMNAMES(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_VSym)), 1),
00848             gg, rho = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_envSym), vv;
00849         int *gdims;
00850         
00851         if (!isString(pnames) || LENGTH(pnames) != s)
00852             error(_("Slot V must be a matrix with %d named columns"), s);
00853         for (int i = 0; i < s; i++) { /* par. vals. into env. */
00854             vv = findVarInFrame(rho,
00855                                 install(CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i))));
00856             if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00857                 error(_("Parameter %s in the environment must be a length %d numeric vector"),
00858                       CHAR(STRING_ELT(pnames, i)), n);
00859             Memcpy(REAL(vv), eta + i * n, n);
00860         }
00861         vv = PROTECT(eval(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_nlmodelSym), rho));
00862         if (!isReal(vv) || LENGTH(vv) != n)
00863             error(_("evaluated model is not a numeric vector of length %d"), n);
00864         gg = getAttrib(vv, lme4_gradientSym);
00865         if (!isReal(gg) || !isMatrix(gg))
00866             error(_("gradient attribute of evaluated model must be a numeric matrix"));
00867         gdims = INTEGER(getAttrib(gg, R_DimSymbol));
00868         if (gdims[0] != n ||gdims[1] != s)
00869             error(_("gradient matrix must be of size %d by %d"), n, s);
00870                                 /* colnames of the gradient
00871                                  * corresponding to the order of the
00872                                  * pnames has been checked */
00873         Free(eta);
00874         eta = etaold;
00875         Memcpy(eta, REAL(vv), n);
00876         Memcpy(V, REAL(gg), ns);
00877         UNPROTECT(1);
00878     }
00879 
00880     if (muEta) {
00881         lme4_muEta(mu, muEta, eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
00882         lme4_varFunc(var, mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
00883     } else {
00884         Memcpy(mu, eta, n);
00885     }
00886 
00887     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
00888     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
00889         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * (srwt ? srwt[i] : 1);
00890         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
00891     }
00892                                 /* store u'u */
00893     d[usqr_POS] = sqr_length((double*)(cu->x), dims[q_POS]);
00894     d[pwrss_POS] = d[usqr_POS] + d[wrss_POS];
00895     d[sigmaML_POS] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/
00896                           (srwt ? sqr_length(srwt, n) : (double) n));
00897     d[sigmaREML_POS] = (V || muEta) ? NA_REAL :
00898         d[sigmaML_POS] * sqrt((((double) n)/((double)(n - p))));
00899     return d[pwrss_POS];
00900 }
00901 
00910 static void update_ranef(SEXP x)
00911 {
00912     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), *perm = PERM_VEC(x);
00913     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
00914     double *b = RANEF_SLOT(x), *u = U_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
00915     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
00916     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
00917     R_CheckStack(); 
00918 
00919     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
00920                                 /* inverse permutation */
00921     for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) b[perm[i]] = u[i];
00922     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
00923         for (int k = 0; k < nc[i]; k++) { /* multiply by \tilde{S}_i */
00924             double dd = st[i][k * (nc[i] + 1)];
00925             int base = Gp[i] + k * nlev[i];
00926             for (int kk = 0; kk < nlev[i]; kk++) b[base + kk] *= dd;
00927         }
00928         if (nc[i] > 1) {        /* multiply by \tilde{T}_i */
00929             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nlev + i, nc + i, one,
00930                             st[i], nc + i, b + Gp[i], nlev + i);
00931         }
00932     }
00933 }
00934 
00943 static double update_RX(SEXP x)
00944 {
00945     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), info;
00946     int n = dims[n_POS], p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS], s = dims[s_POS];
00947     double *cx = Cx_SLOT(x), *d = DEV_SLOT(x),
00948         *RZX = RZX_SLOT(x), *RX = RX_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x),
00949         *WX = (double*) NULL, *X = X_SLOT(x),
00950         mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
00951     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x);
00952     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
00953     CHM_DN cRZX = N_AS_CHM_DN(RZX, q, p), ans;
00954     R_CheckStack();
00955 
00956     if (sXwt) {                 /* Create W^{1/2}GHX in WX */
00957         WX = Calloc(n * p, double);
00958 
00959         AZERO(WX, n * p);
00960         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++)
00961             for (int k = 0; k < s; k++)
00962                 for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
00963                     WX[i + j * n] +=
00964                         sXwt[i + k * n] * X[i + n * (k + j * s)];
00965         X = WX;
00966         /* Replace A by C, either just the x component or the entire matrix */
00967         if (cx) A->x = (void*)cx;
00968         else {
00969             A = Cm_SLOT(x);
00970             R_CheckStack();
00971         }
00972     }
00973                                 /* solve L %*% RZX = PAW^{1/2}GHX */
00974     P_sdmult(RZX, (int*)L->Perm, A, X, p); /* right-hand side */
00975     ans = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, cRZX, &c); /* solution */
00976     Memcpy(RZX, (double*)(ans->x), q * p);
00977     M_cholmod_free_dense(&ans, &c);
00978                                 /* downdate X'X and factor  */
00979     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &n, one, X, &n, zero, RX, &p); /* X'X */
00980     F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &p, &q, mone, RZX, &q, one, RX, &p);
00981     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &p, RX, &p, &info);
00982     if (info)
00983         error(_("Downdated X'X is not positive definite, %d."), info);
00984                                 /* accumulate log(det(RX)^2)  */
00985     d[ldRX2_POS] = 0;
00986     for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) d[ldRX2_POS] += 2 * log(RX[j * (p + 1)]);
00987 
00988     if (WX) Free(WX);
00989     return d[ML_POS];
00990 }
00991 
00992 /* Level-2 utilities that call at least one of the level-1 utilities */
00993 
01001 static void
01002 ST_setPars(SEXP x, const double *pars)
01003 {
01004     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS], pos = 0;
01005     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01006     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01007     R_CheckStack();
01008 
01009     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01010                                 /* install the parameters in the ST slot */
01011     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01012         int nci = nc[i], ncp1 = nc[i] + 1;
01013         double *sti = st[i];
01014 
01015         for (int j = 0; j < nci; j++)
01016             sti[j * ncp1] = pars[pos++];
01017         for (int j = 0; j < (nci - 1); j++)
01018             for (int k = j + 1; k < nci; k++)
01019                 sti[k + j * nci] = pars[pos++];
01020     }
01021     update_A(x);
01022 }
01023 
01033 static int update_u(SEXP x, int verb)
01034 {
01035     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01036     int i, n = dims[n_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01037     double *Cx = Cx_SLOT(x), *sXwt = SXWT_SLOT(x),
01038         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *u = U_SLOT(x),
01039         cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)q), 
01040         crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, step;
01041     double *tmp = Alloca(q, double), *tmp1 = Alloca(q, double),
01042         *uold = Alloca(q, double), one[] = {1,0}, zero[] = {0,0};
01043     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01044     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, n, 1),
01045         ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, q, 1), sol;
01046     CHM_SP C = Cm_SLOT(x);
01047     R_CheckStack();
01048     
01049     if (!sXwt) return(0);       /* nothing to do for LMMs */
01050     if (!(L->is_ll)) error(_("L must be LL', not LDL'"));
01051     if (q > n) error(_("q = %d > n = %d"), q, n);
01052     if (Cx) {               /* A and C have the same structure */
01053         C = A_SLOT(x);
01054         R_CheckStack();
01055         C->x = (void*)Cx;
01056     }
01057     
01058     /* resetting u to zero at the beginning of each evaluation
01059      * requires more iterations but is necessary to obtain a
01060      * repeatable evaluation.  If this is not done the optimization
01061      * algorithm can take wild steps. */
01062     AZERO(u, q);
01063     update_mu(x);
01064     for (i = 0; ; i++) {
01065         
01066         Memcpy(uold, u, q);
01067         pwrss_old = update_L(x);
01068                                 /* tmp := PC %*% wtdResid */
01069         M_cholmod_sdmult(C, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01070         Memcpy(tmp1, tmp, q);
01071         apply_perm(tmp, tmp1, (int*)L->Perm, q);
01072                                 /* tmp := tmp - u */
01073         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) tmp[j] -= u[j];
01074                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01075         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01076             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01077         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01078         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01079                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01080         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, q) / pwrss_old;
01081         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01082                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01083         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01084             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01085         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), q);
01086         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01087 
01088         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01089             for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] = uold[j] + step * tmp[j];
01090             pwrss = update_mu(x);
01091             if (verb < 0)
01092                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01093                         i, step, crit, pwrss, pwrss_old, u[1], u[2]);
01094             if (pwrss < pwrss_old) {
01095                 pwrss_old = pwrss;
01096                 break;
01097             }
01098         }
01099         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01100     }
01101     return i;
01102 }
01103 
01104 /* Level-3 utilities that call at least one level-2 utilities */
01105 
01117 static void MCMC_beta_u(SEXP x, double sigma, double *fvals, double *rvals)
01118 {
01119     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01120     int i1 = 1, p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01121     double *V = V_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
01122         *u = U_SLOT(x), mone[] = {-1,0}, one[] = {1,0};
01123     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01124     double *del1 = Alloca(q, double), *del2 = Alloca(p, double);
01125     CHM_DN sol, rhs = N_AS_CHM_DN(del1, q, 1);
01126     R_CheckStack();
01127 
01128     if (V || muEta) {
01129         error(_("Update not yet written"));
01130     } else {                    /* Linear mixed model */
01131         update_L(x);
01132         update_RX(x);
01133         lmm_update_fixef_u(x);
01134                                 /* Update beta */
01135         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) del2[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01136         F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &p, RX_SLOT(x), &p, del2, &i1);
01137         for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) fixef[j] += del2[j];
01138                                 /* Update u */
01139         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) del1[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01140         F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &q, &p, mone, RZX_SLOT(x), &q,
01141                         del2, &i1, one, del1, &i1);
01142         sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, rhs, &c);
01143         for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) u[j] += ((double*)(sol->x))[j];
01144         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01145         update_mu(x);        /* and parts of the deviance slot */
01146     }
01147     Memcpy(fvals, fixef, p);
01148     if (rvals) {
01149         update_ranef(x);
01150         Memcpy(rvals, RANEF_SLOT(x), q);
01151     }
01152 }
01153 
01161 /* FIXME: Probably should fold this function into MCMC_S */
01162 static void MCMC_T(SEXP x, double sigma)
01163 {
01164     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), nf = (DIMS_SLOT(x))[nf_POS];
01165     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01166     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01167     R_CheckStack();
01168 
01169     if (ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev) < 2) return;
01170     error("Code for non-trivial theta_T not yet written");
01171 }
01172 
01180 static void MCMC_S(SEXP x, double sigma)
01181 {
01182     CHM_SP A = A_SLOT(x), Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01183     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *ai = (int*)(A->i),
01184         *ap = (int*)(A->p), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), *perm = PERM_VEC(x);
01185     int annz = ap[A->ncol], info, i1 = 1, n = dims[n_POS],
01186         nf = dims[nf_POS], ns, p = dims[p_POS], pos,
01187         q = dims[q_POS], znnz = ((int*)(Zt->p))[Zt->ncol];
01188     double *R, *ax = (double*)(A->x), *b = RANEF_SLOT(x),
01189         *eta = ETA_SLOT(x), *offset = OFFSET_SLOT(x),  
01190         *rr, *ss, one = 1, *u = U_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x);
01191     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
01192         *spt = Alloca(nf + 1, int);
01193     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01194     R_CheckStack();
01195 
01196     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01197     ns = 0;                     /* ns is length(theta_S) */
01198     spt[0] = 0;                 /* pointers into ss for terms */
01199     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01200         ns += nc[i];
01201         spt[i + 1] = spt[i] + nc[i];
01202     }
01203 
01204     if (annz == znnz) { /* Copy Z' to A unless A has new nonzeros */
01205         Memcpy(ax, (double*)(Zt->x), znnz);
01206     } else error("Code not yet written for MCMC_S with NLMMs");
01207                                 /* Create T'Zt in A */
01208     Tt_Zt(A, Gp, nc, nlev, st, nf); 
01209                                 /* Create P'u in ranef slot */
01210     for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) b[perm[i]] = u[i];
01211                                 /* Create X\beta + offset in eta slot */
01212     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
01213     F77_CALL(dgemv)("N", &n, &p, &one, X_SLOT(x), &n,
01214                     FIXEF_SLOT(x), &i1, &one, eta, &i1);
01215                                 /* Allocate R, rr and ss */
01216     R = Alloca(ns * ns, double); /* crossproduct matrix then factor */
01217     rr = Alloca(ns, double);     /* row of model matrix for theta_S */
01218     ss = Alloca(ns, double);     /* right hand side, then theta_S */
01219     R_CheckStack();
01220     AZERO(R, ns * ns);
01221     AZERO(ss, ns);
01222     /* Accumulate crossproduct from pseudo-data part of model matrix */
01223     for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {
01224         int sj = theta_S_ind(i, nf, Gp, nlev, spt);
01225         AZERO(rr, ns);
01226         rr[sj] = b[i];
01227         F77_CALL(dsyr)("U", &ns, &one, rr, &i1, R, &ns);
01228     }   
01229     /* Accumulate crossproduct and residual product of the model matrix. */
01230     /* This is done one row at a time.  Rows of the model matrix
01231      * correspond to columns of T'Zt */
01232     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) { /* jth column of T'Zt */
01233         AZERO(rr, ns);
01234         for (int p = ap[j]; p < ap[j + 1]; p++) {
01235             int i = ai[p];      /* row in T'Zt */
01236             int sj = theta_S_ind(i, nf, Gp, nlev, spt);
01237 
01238             rr[sj] += ax[p] * b[i];
01239             ss[sj] += rr[sj] * (y[j] - eta[j]);
01240         }
01241         F77_CALL(dsyr)("U", &ns, &one, rr, &i1, R, &ns);
01242     }
01243     F77_CALL(dposv)("U", &ns, &i1, R, &ns, ss, &ns, &info);
01244     if (info)
01245         error(_("Model matrix for theta_S is not positive definite, %d."), info);
01246     for (int j = 0; j < ns; j++) rr[j] = sigma * norm_rand();
01247     /* Sample from the conditional Gaussian distribution */
01248     F77_CALL(dtrsv)("U", "N", "N", &ns, R, &ns, rr, &i1);
01249     for (int j = 0; j < ns; j++) ss[j] += rr[j];
01250     /* Copy positive part of solution onto diagonals of ST */
01251     pos = 0;
01252     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01253         for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
01254             st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] = (ss[pos] > 0) ? ss[pos] : 0;
01255             pos++;
01256         }
01257     }
01258     update_A(x);
01259 }
01260 
01261 /* Externally callable functions */
01262 
01271 SEXP mer_create_L(SEXP CmP)
01272 {
01273     double one[] = {1, 0};
01274     CHM_SP Cm = AS_CHM_SP(CmP);
01275     CHM_FR L;
01276     R_CheckStack();
01277 
01278     L = M_cholmod_analyze(Cm, &c);
01279     if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Cm, one, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
01280         error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
01281               c.status, L->minor, L->n);
01282 
01283     return M_chm_factor_to_SEXP(L, 1);
01284 }
01285 
01294 SEXP mer_MCMCsamp(SEXP x, SEXP fm)
01295 {
01296     SEXP devsamp = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym);
01297     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), nsamp = LENGTH(devsamp);
01298     int n = dims[n_POS], np = dims[np_POS],
01299         p = dims[p_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01300     double
01301         *STsamp = REAL(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym)),
01302         *d = DEV_SLOT(fm), *dev = REAL(devsamp),
01303         *sig = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sigmaSym),
01304         *fixsamp = FIXEF_SLOT(x), *resamp = RANEF_SLOT(x);
01305 
01306     GetRNGstate();
01307     /* The first column of storage slots contains the fitted values */
01308     for (int i = 1; i < nsamp; i++) {
01309 /* FIXME: This is probably wrong for a model with weights. */
01310         if (sig)                /* update and store sigma */
01311             sig[i] = sqrt(d[pwrss_POS]/rchisq((double)(n + q)));
01312                         /* update L, RX, beta, u, eta, mu, res and d */
01313         MCMC_beta_u(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1, fixsamp + i * p,
01314                     resamp + (resamp ? i : 0) * q); 
01315         dev[i] = d[ML_POS];
01316                                 /* update theta_T, theta_S and A */
01317         MCMC_T(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1);
01318         MCMC_S(fm, sig ? sig[i] : 1);
01319         ST_getPars(fm, STsamp + i * np); /* record theta */
01320     }
01321     PutRNGstate();
01322                 /* Restore pars from the first columns of the samples */
01323     ST_setPars(fm, STsamp);
01324     Memcpy(FIXEF_SLOT(fm), fixsamp, p);
01325     update_u(fm, 0);
01326     update_L(fm);
01327     update_RX(fm);
01328     lmm_update_fixef_u(fm);
01329     update_ranef(fm);
01330 
01331     return x;
01332 }
01333 
01343 SEXP 
01344 mer_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbp)
01345 {
01346     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym);
01347     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), verb = asInteger(verbp);
01348     int lmm = !(MUETA_SLOT(x) || V_SLOT(x)), nf = dims[nf_POS];
01349     int nv = dims[np_POS] + (lmm ? 0 : dims[p_POS]);
01350     int liv = S_iv_length(OPT, nv), lv = S_v_length(OPT, nv);
01351     double *g = (double*)NULL, *h = (double*)NULL, fx = R_PosInf;
01352     double *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x);
01353     int *iv = Alloca(liv, int);
01354     double *b = Alloca(2 * nv, double), *d = Alloca(nv, double),
01355         *v = Alloca(lv, double), *xv = Alloca(nv, double);
01356     R_CheckStack();
01357 
01358     ST_getPars(x, xv);
01359     if (!lmm) {
01360         double eta = 1.e-5; /* estimated rel. error on computed lpdisc */
01361 
01362         Memcpy(xv + dims[np_POS], fixef, dims[p_POS]);
01363         v[31] = eta;            /* RFCTOL */
01364         v[36] = eta;            /* SCTOL */
01365         v[41] = eta;            /* ETA0 */
01366     }
01367                                 /* initialize the state vectors v and iv */
01368     S_Rf_divset(OPT, iv, liv, lv, v);
01369     if (verb) iv[OUTLEV] = 1;
01370                                 /* set the bounds to plus/minus Infty  */
01371     for (int i = 0; i < nv; i++) {
01372         b[2*i] = R_NegInf; b[2*i+1] = R_PosInf; d[i] = 1;
01373     }
01374                                 /* reset lower bounds on elements of theta_S */
01375     for (int i = 0, pos = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01376         int nc = *INTEGER(getAttrib(VECTOR_ELT(ST, i), R_DimSymbol));
01377         for (int j = 0; j < nc; j++) b[pos + 2*j] = 0;
01378         pos += nc * (nc + 1);
01379     }
01380     do {
01381         ST_setPars(x, xv);              /* update ST and A */
01382 /* FIXME: Change this so that update_dev is always called and that
01383  * function does the selection of methods based on lmm. The Memcpy
01384  * call should always be used but the number of values to copy can be
01385  * zero. */
01386         if (lmm) {
01387             update_L(x);
01388             update_RX(x);
01389             fx = lmm_update_fixef_u(x);
01390         } else {
01391             Memcpy(fixef, xv + dims[np_POS], dims[p_POS]);
01392             update_u(x, verb);
01393             mer_update_dev(x);
01394             fx = DEV_SLOT(x)[ML_POS];
01395         }
01396         S_nlminb_iterate(b, d, fx, g, h, iv, liv, lv, nv, v, xv);
01397     } while (iv[0] == 1 || iv[0] == 2);
01398     update_RX(x);
01399     lmm_update_fixef_u(x);
01400     dims[cvg_POS] = iv[0];
01401     return R_NilValue;
01402 }
01403 
01412 SEXP mer_postVar(SEXP x)
01413 {
01414     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01415     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS];
01416     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(VECSXP, nf));
01417     double *vv, one[] = {1,0}, sc;
01418     CHM_SP sm1, sm2;
01419     CHM_DN dm1;
01420     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01421     int *Perm = (int*)(L->Perm), *iperm = Alloca(q, int),
01422         *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01423     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01424     R_CheckStack();
01425 
01426     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01427     for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) iperm[Perm[j]] = j; /* inverse permutation */
01428     sc = dims[useSc_POS] ?
01429         (DEV_SLOT(x)[dims[isREML_POS] ? sigmaREML_POS : sigmaML_POS]) : 1;
01430     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01431         int ncisqr = nc[i] * nc[i];
01432         CHM_SP rhs = M_cholmod_allocate_sparse(q, nc[i], nc[i],
01433                                                1/*sorted*/, 1/*packed*/,
01434                                                0/*stype*/, CHOLMOD_REAL, &c);
01435 
01436         SET_VECTOR_ELT(ans, i, alloc3DArray(REALSXP, nc[i], nc[i], nlev[i]));
01437         vv = REAL(VECTOR_ELT(ans, i));
01438         for (int j = 0; j <= nc[i]; j++) ((int *)(rhs->p))[j] = j;
01439         for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
01440             ((double *)(rhs->x))[j] = st[i][j * (nc[i] + 1)] * sc;
01441         for (int k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++) {
01442             double *vvk = vv + k * ncisqr;
01443             for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++)
01444                 ((int*)(rhs->i))[j] = iperm[Gp[i] + k + j * nlev[i]];
01445             sm1 = M_cholmod_spsolve(CHOLMOD_L, L, rhs, &c);
01446             sm2 = M_cholmod_transpose(sm1, 1 /*values*/, &c);
01447             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c);
01448             sm1 = M_cholmod_aat(sm2, (int*)NULL, (size_t)0, 1 /*mode*/, &c);
01449             dm1 = M_cholmod_sparse_to_dense(sm1, &c);
01450             M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm1, &c); M_cholmod_free_sparse(&sm2, &c);
01451             Memcpy(vvk, (double*)(dm1->x), ncisqr);
01452             M_cholmod_free_dense(&dm1, &c);
01453             if (nc[i] > 1) {
01454                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
01455                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
01456                 F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "L", "T", "U", nc + i, nc + i,
01457                                 one, st[i], nc + i, vvk, nc + i);
01458             }
01459         }
01460         M_cholmod_free_sparse(&rhs, &c);
01461     }
01462     UNPROTECT(1);
01463     return ans;
01464 }
01465 
01473 SEXP mer_ST_chol(SEXP x)
01474 {
01475     SEXP ans = PROTECT(duplicate(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym)));
01476     int ncmax, nf = DIMS_SLOT(x)[nf_POS];
01477     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01478     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
01479     R_CheckStack();
01480 
01481     ncmax = ST_nc_nlev(ans, Gp_SLOT(x), st, nc, nlev);
01482     for (int k = 0; k < nf; k++) {
01483         if (nc[k] > 1) {        /* nothing to do for nc[k] == 1 */
01484             int nck = nc[k], nckp1 = nc[k] + 1;
01485             double *stk = st[k];
01486 
01487             for (int j = 0; j < nck; j++) {
01488                 double dd = stk[j * nckp1]; /* diagonal el */
01489                 for (int i = j + 1; i < nck; i++) {
01490                     stk[j + i * nck] = dd * stk[i + j * nck];
01491                     stk[i + j * nck] = 0;
01492                 }
01493             }
01494         }
01495     }
01496 
01497     UNPROTECT(1);
01498     return ans;
01499 }
01500 
01508 SEXP mer_ST_getPars(SEXP x)
01509 {
01510     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocVector(REALSXP, DIMS_SLOT(x)[np_POS]));
01511     ST_getPars(x, REAL(ans));
01512 
01513     UNPROTECT(1); 
01514     return ans;
01515 }
01516 
01526 SEXP mer_ST_initialize(SEXP ST, SEXP Gpp, SEXP Zt)
01527 {
01528     int *Gp = INTEGER(Gpp),
01529         *Zdims = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_DimSym)),
01530         *zi = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_iSym)), nf = LENGTH(ST);
01531     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int),
01532         nnz = INTEGER(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_pSym))[Zdims[1]];
01533     double *rowsqr = Alloca(Zdims[0], double),
01534         **st = Alloca(nf, double*),
01535         *zx = REAL(GET_SLOT(Zt, lme4_xSym));
01536     R_CheckStack();
01537     
01538     ST_nc_nlev(ST, Gp, st, nc, nlev);
01539     AZERO(rowsqr, Zdims[0]);
01540     for (int i = 0; i < nnz; i++) rowsqr[zi[i]] += zx[i] * zx[i];
01541     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01542         AZERO(st[i], nc[i] * nc[i]);
01543         for (int j = 0; j < nc[i]; j++) {
01544             double *stij = st[i] + j * (nc[i] + 1);
01545             for (int k = 0; k < nlev[i]; k++)
01546                 *stij += rowsqr[Gp[i] + j * nlev[i] + k];
01547             *stij = sqrt(nlev[i]/(0.375 * *stij));
01548         }
01549     }
01550     return R_NilValue;
01551 }
01552 
01562 SEXP mer_ST_setPars(SEXP x, SEXP pars)
01563 {
01564     int npar = DIMS_SLOT(x)[np_POS];
01565 
01566     if (!isReal(pars) || LENGTH(pars) != npar)
01567         error(_("pars must be a real vector of length %d"), npar);
01568     ST_setPars(x, REAL(pars));
01569     return R_NilValue;
01570 }
01571 
01579 SEXP mer_update_dev(SEXP x)
01580 {
01581     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x);
01582     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01583 
01584     if (MUETA_SLOT(x)) {
01585         if (dims[nAGQ_POS] > 1) {
01586             error("Code not yet written");
01587         }
01588         d[disc_POS] = lme4_devResid(MU_SLOT(x), PWT_SLOT(x), Y_SLOT(x),
01589                                     dims[n_POS], dims[vTyp_POS]);
01590         d[ML_POS] = d[disc_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01591     } else {
01592         double dn = (double) dims[n_POS];
01593 
01594         d[disc_POS] = d[wrss_POS];
01595         if (dims[nAGQ_POS] > 1) {
01596             error("Code not yet written");
01597         }
01598         d[ML_POS] = dn * (1 + log(2 * PI/dn)) +
01599             d[wrss_POS] + d[ldL2_POS] + d[usqr_POS];
01600     }
01601     return R_NilValue;
01602 }

01618 }

01664     return R_NilValue;

01679 
01680 SEXP merMCMC_VarCorr(SEXP x, SEXP typP)
01681 {
01682     SEXP ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01683         ncs = GET_SLOT(x, install("nc"));
01684     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *Sd = INTEGER(GET_DIM(ST)), *nc = INTEGER(ncs);
01685     int maxnc = 0, nf = LENGTH(ncs), np = Sd[0], nsamp = Sd[1], pos;
01686     double *sig = SLOT_REAL_NULL(x, lme4_sigmaSym);
01687     SEXP ans = PROTECT(allocMatrix(REALSXP, nsamp, np + (sig ? 1 : 0)));
01688     double *av = REAL(ans), *STx = REAL(ST);
01689     double *as = av + nsamp * np, *t1, *t2, var;
01690     int *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
01691     R_CheckStack();
01692 
01693     for (int j = 0; j < nf; j++) {
01694         nlev[j] = (Gp[j + 1] - Gp[j])/nc[j];
01695         if (maxnc < nc[j]) maxnc = nc[j];
01696     }
01697     if (maxnc > 1) {
01698         t1 = Alloca(maxnc * maxnc, double);
01699         t2 = Alloca(maxnc * maxnc, double);
01700         R_CheckStack();
01701     }
01702     
01703     for (int i = 0; i < nsamp; i++) {
01704         var = 1; pos = 0;
01705         if (sig) var = as[i] = sig[i] * sig[i];
01706         for (int k = 0; k < nf; k++) {
01707             if (nc[k] < 2) {
01708                 double sd = STx[pos + i * np] * sig[i];
01709                 av[i + nsamp * pos++] = sd * sd;
01710             }
01711             else error(_("Code not yet written"));
01712         }
01713     }
01714         
01715     UNPROTECT(1);
01716     return ans;
01717 }
01726 SEXP mer_validate(SEXP x)
01727 {
01728     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01729         ST = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym),
01730         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01731         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym),
01732         flistP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_flistSym), asgnP;
01733     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP), *asgn;
01734     int n = dd[n_POS], nf = dd[nf_POS], nq, nfl,
01735         p = dd[p_POS], q = dd[q_POS], s = dd[s_POS];
01736     int nv = n * s;
01737     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x), A =  A_SLOT(x);
01738     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01739     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01740     R_CheckStack();
01741                                 /* check lengths */
01742     if (nf < 1 || LENGTH(ST) != nf)
01743         return mkString(_("Slot ST must have length dims['nf']"));
01744     asgnP = getAttrib(flistP, install("assign"));
01745     if (!isInteger(asgnP) || LENGTH(asgnP) != nf)
01746         return mkString(_("Slot flist must have integer attribute 'assign' of length dims['nf']"));
01747     asgn = INTEGER(asgnP);
01748     nfl = LENGTH(flistP);
01749     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++)
01750         if (asgn[i] <= 0 || asgn[i] > nfl)
01751             return mkString(_("All elements of the assign attribute must be in [1,length(ST)]"));
01752     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01753         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01754     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01755         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01756     if (LENGTH(devianceP) != (wrss_POS + 1) ||
01757         LENGTH(getAttrib(devianceP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (wrss_POS + 1))
01758         return mkString(_("deviance slot not named or incorrect length"));
01759     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01760         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01761         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01762     if (L->n != q || !L->is_ll || !L->is_monotonic)
01763         return mkString(_("Slot L must be a monotonic LL' factorization of size dims['q']"));
01764     if (Zt->nrow != q || Zt->ncol != nv)
01765         return mkString(_("Slot Zt must by dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01766     if (A->nrow != q || A->ncol != nv)
01767         return mkString(_("Slot A must be dims['q']  by dims['n']*dims['s']"));
01768     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_etaSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01769     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01770     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muEtaSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01771     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_muSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01772     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_offsetSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01773     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_pWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01774     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01775     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_residSym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01776     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sqrtrWtSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01777     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_uSym, q, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01778     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_VSym, nv, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01779     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_varSym, n, 1)) return(mkString(buf));
01780     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ySym, n, 0)) return(mkString(buf));
01781     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_XSym, nv, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01782     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RZXSym, q, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01783     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_RXSym, p, p)) return(mkString(buf));
01784 
01785     nq = 0;
01786     for (int i = 0; i < LENGTH(flistP); i++) {
01787         SEXP fli = VECTOR_ELT(flistP, i);
01788         if (!isFactor(fli))
01789             return mkString(_("flist must be a list of factors"));
01790 /*      nq += dm[0] * LENGTH(getAttrib(fli, R_LevelsSymbol)); */
01791     }
01792     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
01793         SEXP STi = VECTOR_ELT(ST, i);
01794         int *dm = INTEGER(getAttrib(STi, R_DimSymbol));
01795         if (!isMatrix(STi) || !isReal(STi) || dm[0] != dm[1])
01796             return
01797                 mkString(_("Slot ST must be a list of square numeric matrices"));
01798         if (Gp[i] > Gp[i + 1])
01799             return mkString(_("Gp must be non-decreasing"));
01800     }
01801 #if 0
01802 /* FIXME: Need to incorporate the assign attribute in the calculation of nq */
01803     if (q != nq)
01804         return mkString(_("q is not sum of columns by levels"));
01805 #endif
01806     return ScalarLogical(1);
01807 }
01808 
01817 SEXP merMCMC_validate(SEXP x)
01818 {
01819     SEXP GpP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_GpSym),
01820         devianceP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_devianceSym),
01821         dimsP = GET_SLOT(x, lme4_dimsSym);
01822     int *Gp = INTEGER(GpP), *dd = INTEGER(dimsP);
01823     int nf = dd[nf_POS], np = dd[np_POS], nsamp = LENGTH(devianceP),
01824         p = dd[p_POS], q = dd[q_POS];
01825     char *buf = Alloca(BUF_SIZE + 1, char);
01826     R_CheckStack();
01827                                 /* check lengths */
01828     if (nsamp <= 0)
01829         return mkString(_("number of samples must be positive"));
01830     if (LENGTH(dimsP) != (cvg_POS + 1) ||
01831         LENGTH(getAttrib(dimsP, R_NamesSymbol)) != (cvg_POS + 1))
01832         return mkString(_("dims slot not named or incorrect length"));
01833     if (LENGTH(GpP) != nf + 1)
01834         return mkString(_("Slot Gp must have length dims['nf'] + 1"));
01835     if (Gp[0] != 0 || Gp[nf] != q)
01836         return mkString(_("Gp[1] != 0 or Gp[dims['nf'] + 1] != dims['q']"));
01837 
01838     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ncSym, nf, 0))
01839         return(mkString(buf));
01840     if (chkLen(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_sigmaSym, nsamp, !dd[useSc_POS]))
01841         return(mkString(buf));
01842     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_STSym, np, nsamp))
01843         return(mkString(buf));
01844     if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_fixefSym, p, nsamp))
01845         return(mkString(buf));
01846     if (LENGTH(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_ranefSym)))
01847         if (chkDims(buf, BUF_SIZE, x, lme4_ranefSym, q, nsamp))
01848             return(mkString(buf));
01849     return ScalarLogical(1);
01850 }
01851 
01860 SEXP spR_update_mu(SEXP x)
01861 {
01862     int *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x);
01863     int n = dims[n_POS];
01864     double *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *eta = Calloc(n, double), *mu = MU_SLOT(x),
01865         *offset = OFFSET_SLOT(x), *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x),
01866         *res = RESID_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), one[] = {1,0};
01867     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01868     CHM_DN cbeta = AS_CHM_DN(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_fixefSym)),
01869         ceta = N_AS_CHM_DN(eta, n, 1);
01870     R_CheckStack();
01871     
01872     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) eta[i] = offset ? offset[i] : 0;
01873     if (!M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 1 /* trans */, one, one, cbeta, ceta, &c))
01874         error(_("cholmod_sdmult error returned"));
01875     lme4_muEta(mu, MUETA_SLOT(x), eta, n, dims[lTyp_POS]);
01876     lme4_varFunc(VAR_SLOT(x), mu, n, dims[vTyp_POS]);
01877 
01878     d[wrss_POS] = 0;            /* update resid slot and d[wrss_POS] */
01879     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
01880         res[i] = (y[i] - mu[i]) * srwt[i];
01881         d[wrss_POS] += res[i] * res[i];
01882     }
01883 
01884     Free(eta);
01885     return R_NilValue;
01886 }
01887 
01888 
01899 SEXP spR_optimize(SEXP x, SEXP verbP)
01900 {
01901     int *zp, m, n, nnz, verb = asInteger(verbP);
01902     double *Zcp, *Ztx, *d = DEV_SLOT(x), *fixef = FIXEF_SLOT(x),
01903         *mu = MU_SLOT(x), *muEta = MUETA_SLOT(x),
01904         *pWt = PWT_SLOT(x), *res = RESID_SLOT(x),
01905         *srwt = SRWT_SLOT(x), *tmp, *tmp2,
01906         *var = VAR_SLOT(x), *y = Y_SLOT(x), cfac, crit,
01907         one[] = {1, 0}, step, wrss_old, zero[] = {0, 0};
01908     CHM_SP Zt = Zt_SLOT(x);
01909     CHM_FR L = L_SLOT(x);
01910     CHM_DN cres = N_AS_CHM_DN(res, Zt->ncol, 1), ctmp, sol;
01911     R_CheckStack();
01912     
01913     zp = (int*)Zt->p;
01914     m = Zt->nrow;
01915     n = Zt->ncol;
01916     nnz = zp[n];
01917     Zcp = Calloc(nnz, double);
01918     Ztx = (double*)Zt->x;
01919     tmp = Calloc(m, double);
01920     tmp2 = Calloc(m, double);
01921     ctmp = N_AS_CHM_DN(tmp, m, 1);
01922     cfac = ((double)n) / ((double)m);
01923     R_CheckStack();
01924 
01925     spR_update_mu(x);
01926     for (int i = 0; ; i++) {
01927         d[wrss_POS] = 0;
01928         for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
01929             srwt[j] = sqrt((pWt ? pWt[j] : 1) / var[j]);
01930             res[j] = srwt[j] * (y[j] - mu[j]);
01931             d[wrss_POS] += res[j] * res[j];
01932             for (int p = zp[j]; p < zp[j + 1]; p++)
01933                 Zcp[p] = srwt[j] * muEta[j] * Ztx[p];
01934         }
01935         Zt->x = (void*)Zcp;
01936         if (!M_cholmod_factorize_p(Zt, zero, (int*)NULL, 0 /*fsize*/, L, &c))
01937             error(_("cholmod_factorize_p failed: status %d, minor %d from ncol %d"),
01938                   c.status, L->minor, L->n);
01939         wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
01940                                 /* tmp := Zt %*% muEta %*% var %*% wtdResid */
01941         M_cholmod_sdmult(Zt, 0 /* notrans */, one, zero, cres, ctmp, &c);
01942         Memcpy(tmp2, tmp, m);
01943         apply_perm(tmp, tmp2, (int*)L->Perm, m);
01944                                 /* solve L %*% sol = tmp */
01945         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_L, L, ctmp, &c)))
01946             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_L) failed"));
01947         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
01948         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01949                                 /* evaluate convergence criterion */
01950         crit = cfac * sqr_length(tmp, m) / wrss_old;
01951         if (crit < CM_TOL) break; /* don't do needless evaluations */
01952                                 /* solve t(L) %*% sol = tmp */
01953         if (!(sol = M_cholmod_solve(CHOLMOD_Lt, L, ctmp, &c)))
01954             error(_("cholmod_solve (CHOLMOD_Lt) failed"));
01955         Memcpy(tmp, (double*)(sol->x), m);
01956         M_cholmod_free_dense(&sol, &c);
01957 
01958         Memcpy(tmp2, fixef, m);
01959         for (step = 1; step > CM_SMIN; step /= 2) { /* step halving */
01960             for (int j = 0; j < m; j++) fixef[j] = tmp2[j] + step * tmp[j];
01961             spR_update_mu(x);
01962             if (verb < 0)
01963                 Rprintf("%2d,%8.6f,%12.4g: %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g %15.6g\n",
01964                         i, step, crit, d[wrss_POS], wrss_old, fixef[1], fixef[2]);
01965             if (d[wrss_POS] < wrss_old) {
01966                 wrss_old = d[wrss_POS];
01967                 break;
01968             }
01969         }
01970         if (step <= CM_SMIN || i > CM_MAXITER) return 0;
01971     }
01972     Free(tmp2);
01973     Free(Zcp);
01974     Free(tmp);
01975     return R_NilValue;
01976 }

02031 static void
02032 safe_pd_matrix(double x[], const char uplo[], int n, double thresh)
02033 {
02034     int info, lwork = 3 * n, nm1 = n - 1;
02035     double *work = Alloca(3 * n, double),
02036         *w = Alloca(n, double),
02037         *xcp = Memcpy(Alloca(n * n, double), x, n * n);
02038 
02039     F77_CALL(dsyev)("N", uplo, &n, xcp, &n, w, work, &lwork, &info);
02040     if (info) error(_("dsyev returned %d"), info);
02041     if (w[nm1] <= 0) error(_("no positive eigenvalues!"));
02042     if ((w[0]/w[nm1]) < thresh) {
02043         int i, np1 = n + 1;
02044         double incr = w[nm1] * thresh;
02045         for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) x[i * np1] += incr;
02046     }
02047 }
02048 
02058 static void MCMC_ST(SEXP x, double sigma, double *vals)
02059 {
02060     int *Gp = Gp_SLOT(x), *dims = DIMS_SLOT(x), *perm = PERM_VEC(x);
02061     int nf = dims[nf_POS], q = dims[q_POS], pos = 0;
02062     double *Ptu = Calloc(q, double), *u = U_SLOT(x);
02063     double **st = Alloca(nf, double*);
02064     int *nc = Alloca(nf, int), *nlev = Alloca(nf, int);
02065     R_CheckStack();
02066 
02067     ST_nc_nlev(GET_SLOT(x, lme4_STSym), Gp, st, nc, nlev);
02068                                 /* inverse permutation of u */
02069     for (int j = 0; j < q; j++) Ptu[perm[j]] = u[j];
02070 
02071     for (int i = 0; i < nf; i++) {
02072         int qi = nc[i], nl = nlev[i];
02073         double *sti = st[i], *ui = Ptu + Gp[i];
02074 
02075         if (qi == 1) {
02076             *sti *= sqrt(sqr_length(ui, nl)/rchisq((double)nl))/sigma;
02077             vals[pos++] = *sti;
02078         } else {
02079             int info, qisq = qi * qi, qip1 = qi + 1;
02080             double invsigsq = 1/(sigma * sigma), one[] = {1,0}, zer[] = {0,0};
02081 
02082             double *scal = Alloca(qisq, double), *tmp = Alloca(qisq, double);
02083             R_CheckStack();
02084                                 /* scal := crossprod(U_i)/sigma^2 */
02085             F77_CALL(dsyrk)("L", "T", &qi, &nl, &invsigsq, ui, &nl,
02086                             zer, scal, &qi); 
02087             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &qi, scal, &qi, &info);
02088             if (info)
02089                 error(_("scal matrix %d is not positive definite"), i + 1);
02090             /* solve W_i' B_i = R_i for W_i a random std Wishart factor */
02091             F77_CALL(dtrsm)("L", "L", "T", "N", &qi, &qi, one,
02092                             std_rWishart_factor((double)(nl - qi + 1), qi, 0, tmp),
02093                             &qi, scal, &qi);
02094                                 /* B_i := T(theta) %*% S(theta) %*% B_i */
02095             for (int k = 0; k < qi; k++)
02096                 for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++)
02097                     scal[j * qi + k] *= st[i][k * qip1];
02098             F77_CALL(dtrmm)("L", "L", "N", "U", &qi, &qi, one, st[i], &qi, scal, &qi);
02099                                 /* Create the lower Cholesky factor */
02100             F77_CALL(dsyrk)("L", "T", &qi, &qi, one, scal, &qi, zer, tmp, &qi); 
02101             F77_CALL(dpotrf)("L", &qi, tmp, &qi, &info);
02102             if (info)
02103                 error(_("crossproduct matrix %d is not positive definite"), i + 1);
02104                                 /* Update S_i and T_i */
02105             for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++) vals[pos++] = sti[j * qip1] = tmp[j * qip1];
02106             for (int j = 0; j < qi; j++)
02107                 for (int k = j + 1; k < qi; k++)
02108                     vals[pos++] = sti[j * qi + k] = tmp[j * qi + k]/sti[j * qip1];
02109         }
02110     }
02111     update_A(x);
02112     Free(Ptu);
02113 }
02114 
02115 /* Functions for sampling from a Wishart distribution */
02116 /* FIXME: Move these to the R sources */
02117 
02130 static double
02131 *std_rWishart_factor(double nu, int p, int upper, double ans[])
02132 {
02133     int pp1 = p + 1;
02134 
02135     if (nu < (double) p || p <= 0)
02136         error("inconsistent degrees of freedom and dimension");
02137 
02138     AZERO(ans, p * p);
02139     for (int j = 0; j < p; j++) {       /* jth column */
02140         ans[j * pp1] = sqrt(rchisq(nu - (double) j));
02141         for (int i = 0; i < j; i++) {
02142             int uind = i + j * p, /* upper triangle index */
02143                 lind = j + i * p; /* lower triangle index */
02144             ans[(upper ? uind : lind)] = norm_rand();
02145             ans[(upper ? lind : uind)] = 0;
02146         }
02147     }
02148     return ans;
02149 }
02150 
02160 SEXP
02161 lme4_rWishart(SEXP ns, SEXP nuP, SEXP scal)
02162 {
02163     SEXP ans;
02164     int *dims = INTEGER(getAttrib(scal, R_DimSymbol)), info,
02165         n = asInteger(ns), psqr;
02166     double *scCp, *ansp, *tmp, nu = asReal(nuP), one = 1, zero = 0;
02167 
02168     if (!isMatrix(scal) || !isReal(scal) || dims[0] != dims[1])
02169         error("scal must be a square, real matrix");
02170     if (n <= 0) n = 1;
02171     psqr = dims[0] * dims[0];
02172     tmp = Alloca(psqr, double);
02173     scCp = Alloca(psqr, double);
02174     R_CheckStack();
02175 
02176     Memcpy(scCp, REAL(scal), psqr);
02177     AZERO(tmp, psqr);
02178     F77_CALL(dpotrf)("U", &(dims[0]), scCp, &(dims[0]), &info);
02179     if (info)
02180         error("scal matrix is not positive-definite");
02181     PROTECT(ans = alloc3DArray(REALSXP, dims[0], dims[0], n));
02182     ansp = REAL(ans);
02183     GetRNGstate();
02184     for (int j = 0; j < n; j++) {
02185         double *ansj = ansp + j * psqr;
02186         std_rWishart_factor(nu, dims[0], 1, tmp);
02187         F77_CALL(dtrmm)("R", "U", "N", "N", dims, dims,
02188                         &one, scCp, dims, tmp, dims);
02189         F77_CALL(dsyrk)("U", "T", &(dims[1]), &(dims[1]),
02190                         &one, tmp, &(dims[1]),
02191                         &zero, ansj, &(dims[1]));
02192 
02193         for (int i = 1; i < dims[0]; i++)
02194             for (int k = 0; k < i; k++)
02195                 ansj[i + k * dims[0]] = ansj[k + i * dims[0]];
02196     }
02197 
02198     PutRNGstate();
02199     UNPROTECT(1);
02200     return ans;
02201 }
02202

02216 static R_INLINE double*
02217 apply_iperm(double *dest, const double *src, const int *perm, int n)
02218 {
02219     for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) dest[perm ? perm[i] : i] = src[i];
02220     return dest;
02221 }
